thread.title: Inside Out Media Names Travel Industry Veteran Vice President of Content Strategy and Business Development
thread.title_full: Inside Out Media Names Travel Industry Veteran Vice President of Content Strategy and Business Development

author: Inside Out Media
title: Inside Out Media Names Travel Industry Veteran Vice President of Content Strategy and Business Development
text: Receive press releases from Inside Out Media: By Email RSS Feeds: Inside Out Media Names Travel Industry Veteran Vice President of Content Strategy and Business Development Chicago, IL, October 08, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Inside Out Media has announced that Robert Patterson, a 15-year veteran of the travel and tourism industry has been appointed Vice President of Content Strategy and Business Development. In his new position, Patterson will be responsible for all content, influencer and social media strategy, implementation and business development. He will report directly to Inside Out Media President, Harley Schachter.Prior to joining Inside Out Media, Patterson was the Vice President of Content and Social Strategy at MMGY Global where he led marketing programs for top travel brands such as the Colorado Tourism Office, Marriott Resorts and Lufthansa. During his tenure at MMGY Global, Patterson’s content, social media and influencer marketing programs received numerous industry recognitions including Travel+Leisure’s SMITTY Award, HSMAI Adrian Awards and he was named to the Skift30 list of the travel industry’s top online marketers.“The addition of Robert to our team signals an important step in the growth of our content and social media business,” said Harley Schachter, Inside Out Media’s President. His thought leadership, experience and proven track record will help Inside Out Media continue to innovate and provide clients with excellent products and services.About Inside Out MediaSpecializing in adventure and experiential travel, Inside Out Media is the parent company of iExplore and Travel Mindset. Inside Out Media provides custom created content, native advertising, social media programs and traditional digital advertising products to travel and tourism brands. Contact Information
